ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description: diffpy.snmf implements the stretched non negative matrix factorization (sNMF) and sparse stretched NMF (ssNMF) algorithms. This algorithm is designed to do an NMF factorization on a set of signals ignoring any uniform stretching of the signal on the independent variable axis. For example, for powder diffraction data taken from samples containing multiple chemical phases where the measurements were done at different temperatures and the materials were undergoing thermal expansion.
about.summary: A Python package implementing the stretched NMF algorithm.

about.description: diffpy.snmf implements the stretched non negative matrix factorization (sNMF) and sparse stretched NMF (ssNMF) algorithms. This algorithm is designed to do an NMF factorization on a set of signals ignoring any uniform stretching of the signal on the independent variable axis. For example, for powder diffraction data taken from samples containing multiple chemical phases where the measurements were done at different temperatures and the materials were undergoing thermal expansion.
about.summary: A Python package implementing the stretched NMF algorithm.

name: diffpy.snmf
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set python_min = '3.10' %}
{%- set name = "diffpy.snmf" -%}
{%- set version = "0.1.3" -%}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/diffpy_snmf/diffpy_snmf-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 02cf89aba4da3786d550950f31db51cb3dacd8973c5c0da465516d39272f9f41

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools-git-versioning >=2.0
    - pip

  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - cvxpy
    - diffpy.utils
    - numdifftools

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - python {{ python_min }}
  
  imports:
    - diffpy.snmf

  commands:
    - pip check
    - pip list

about:
  home: https://github.com/diffpy/diffpy.snmf/
  summary: A Python package implementing the stretched NMF algorithm.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  description: |
    diffpy.snmf implements the stretched non negative matrix factorization (sNMF) and sparse stretched NMF (ssNMF) algorithms. This algorithm is designed to do an NMF factorization on a set of signals ignoring any uniform stretching of the signal on the independent variable axis. For example, for powder diffraction data taken from samples containing multiple chemical phases where the measurements were done at different temperatures and the materials were undergoing thermal expansion.
  doc_url: http://diffpy.github.io/diffpy.snmf/
  dev_url: https://github.com/diffpy/diffpy.snmf/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sbillinge
    - bobleesj
